channel.title: Ilya Manyahin - Full Stack Developer
channel.description: Recent content on Ilya Manyahin - Full Stack Developer

item.description: Hello, my name is Ilya Manyahin I’m a professional Full Stack Developer I can help you to realize any business idea. My 10 years experies allow me to solve any problem. Undesrtand the whole flow of web application Configurate all the steps of the application like CI and CD I know JavaScript (NodeJS), PHP, Bash Database design in MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB Create interfaces on VueJS, Angular, React, React Native Manage infrastucture on AWS, GCloud, Linux, Docker Sequirty tests and tests making Make Telegram Bots (or any other bots) and Chrome Extensions
